attributes.action: Remove Philip Green's Knighthood.  He has lost the right to be called "Sir"
attributes.background: He has been found to be responsible for the loss of thousands of jobs and has put even more thousands of pensions in jeopardy while he and his wife have got richer at the expense of others. He should not have the right to sit in the house of lords nor does he deserve any respect from others.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
